DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to demonstrate the efficacy and safety of vildagliptin compared to metformin in elderly drug naive patients with type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Vildagliptin Compared to Metformin in Elderly Drug Naive Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Age from 65 years to the upper age limit recommended by local prescribing information for metformin Drug naive patients with type 2 diabetes. Body mass index (BMI) in the range of 2240 kg/m2. HbA1c in the range of 7 to 9% inclusive FPG <270 mg/dL (15 mmol/L) A history of type 1 diabetes Evidence of significant diabetic complications Treatment with insulin or any other oral antidiabetic agents Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
